articles.author: Victor Goury-Laffont
articles.title: France U-turns on inviting Russia to D-Day memorial ceremony - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The prospect of a Russian presence at the Normandy commemorations drew concern from Western allies.
articles.content:
Putin took part in commemorations for the 60th D-Day anniversary in 2004, and again 10 years later for the 70th anniversary, shortly after he illegally annexed Crimea.
Russia’s past presence at D-Da… [+991 chars]

articles.description: A joint European-Japanese satellite has launched to measure how clouds influence the climate. Some low-level clouds are known to cool the planet, others at h...
